Articles.Content:
Just a short question....

I havend played for some time... and now in 1.6 with newest Mods i cant finde the docking option in mechjeb^^

In the mechjeb wiki i also find nothing....  Where has the docking option gone? The Rendezvous Autopilot is also gone :/ But i unlocked them in the techtree....

Can someone help me? :/ THX
I'd suggest asking in the MechJeb forum

Moving to Add-on Discussions.

But as Tyko suggested, probably best to ask in the MechJeb thread-- when you have a question about a specific mod, that mod's thread is usually the best place.

If you're in science or career mode you have to unlock different "blocks" of functionality for MechJeb separately in various places of the tech tree. 

That's probably why you're not seeing them.

I can confirm that MechJeb, and these mods, works OK in v1.7 I was using the most recent release version, which came out about 6 weeks ago.

I did have a problem with one craft I tried, instability in RCS, but that's a known problem, been around for a while, some large assemblies don't settle down.
